Posts.Content: Nov 8, 2017 08:26PM Maitri wrote: I'm there with you. Got the call on Friday - IDC grade 2, with two tumors - one 1cm and the other 2cm. I binge watched Lady Dynamite. We will get through this. Sending you lots of love and hugs.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed IDC and DCIS Scaredmommy1971723 Scaredmommy1971723
